author: senh
title: Columbia Gorge bike up for grabs in Travel Oregon scavenger hunt
text: BING NEWS: Columbia Gorge bike up for grabs in Travel Oregon scavenger hunt A gorge-ous bike is free for the finding this week, when Travel Oregon hides the fifth in its series of bikes, the Columbia Gorge bike. This is a very light carbon fiber road bike, with electronic shifting and a bottle opener built into the frame. 07/20/2015 - 1:03 am | View Link Travel Oregon to host 7 Bikes for 7 Wonders scavenger hunt Travel Oregon to host 7 Bikes for 7 Wonders scavenger hunt Travel Oregon will host a statewide scavenger hunt during the summer to honor the seven wonders of Oregon.
